Title: The Beatles and Philosophy.
Subtitle: Nothing You Can Think that Can't be Thunk.
Authors: Michael Baur;Steven Baur.

Topics addressed include: skepticism and epistemology, the philosophy of love, altered consciousness and drug culture, and Marxism and socialphilosophy"--Provided by publisher..
